title: NymVPN support
description: Start with our FAQs for answers. Reach us via email, social media, or our [Discord](https://nymtech.net/go/discord) / [Matrix](https://matrix.to/#/#general:nymtech.chat) channels for personalized assistance. We're happy to help!

faqs.title: What is NymVPN?
faqs.description: NymVPN is a privacy-focused network-protection product that combines Nym's secure mixnet technology with a decentralized WireGuard VPN for comprehensive online privacy across all use cases.

faqs.title: What makes NymVPN different from other VPN providers?
faqs.description: NymVPN distinguishes itself with its distinctive blend of a mixnet and a decentralized VPN. This combination offers unparalleled online privacy and security.

faqs.title: When will the updated NymVPN be available?
faqs.description: To stay informed and get early access, we recommend signing up on our waitlist. Keep an eye on our announcements for release updates.

faqs.title: What is the expected duration of the private beta?
faqs.description: The expected duration of the private beta for NymVPN will be announced in our official communications and updates. Stay tuned for more information on the beta timeline.

faqs.title: How can I provide feedback or report issues during the beta?
faqs.description: You can provide feedback using your preferred format, whether it's through the in-app report feature, email, social media, or our [Discord](https://nymtech.net/go/discord) / [Matrix](https://matrix.to/#/#general:nymtech.chat) channels. Your input is valuable to us!

faqs.title: Can I use NymVPN for streaming and torrenting?
faqs.description: NymVPN is designed to support a wide range of online activities. For network-intensive use cases like streaming and browsing, you may find that the WireGuard VPN within NymVPN offers better performance compared to the mixnet, though it may come at the expense of some privacy features.

faqs.title: How do I download and install the NymVPN app?
faqs.description: NymVPN is still in development but will be accessible via the nymvpn.com website and application stores upon release. In the meantime, to get a feel for the mixnet technology, you can download the current NymConnect app from our corporate website [Download page](https://nymtech.net/download/nymconnect).

faqs.title: What devices and operating systems will NymVPN support?
faqs.description: NymVPN aims to support a wide range of devices and operating systems, including but not limited to Android, iOS, (GNU/)Linux, macOS and Windows. The specifics of supported devices and systems may evolve, so it's recommended to stay updated on our announcements for the latest information.

faqs.title: Is there a limit on the number of devices I can use with NymVPN?
faqs.description: NymVPN aims to support multi-device setups. Stay tuned for announcements and updates on the specific details.

faqs.title: How does NymVPN handle user data and logging?
faqs.description: NymVPN is committed to respecting your privacy. Our design ensures that Nym can't access or view your online and browsing data. While we are finalizing our privacy policy, you can review our [NymVPN lite paper](https://nymvpn.com/nymVPN-litepaper.pdf) for more detailed information. Your privacy and security are our utmost concerns.

faqs.title: What legal jurisdiction governs NymVPN's operations?
faqs.description: NymVPN's operations fall under the legal jurisdiction of Switzerland, a country known for its political neutrality. Switzerland is not a member of the European Union and is not part of the 14-Eyes intelligence-sharing network. The Swiss jurisdiction provides a strong foundation for protecting user privacy and data security, in accordance with Swiss data protection laws (nFADP) and the Swiss constitution.

faqs.title: What payment methods are accepted for NymVPN subscriptions?
faqs.description: NymVPN aims to provide convenient payment choices for our users. We will accept various payment methods, including debit/credit cards and cryptocurrency options like NYM or Bitcoin.

faqs.title: Does NymVPN offer a money-back guarantee or a trial period?
faqs.description: We recommend visiting our website for the most up-to-date information regarding money-back guarantees and trial periods. These options may vary depending on Nym's jurisdiction and your location.

faqs.title: Is NymVPN suitable for businesses or organizations?
faqs.description: Please contact our Sales team at [contact@nymtech.net](mailto:contact@nymtech.net) to explore how NymVPN can effectively meet the unique needs of your business or organization.
